is.ru.honn.ruber.service

Interface RuberUserService

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    RuberService
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    RuberServiceStub, UserService

    public interface RuberUserService
    Contais methods that relate to user management. These methods were put in a separate interface from RuberService in order to make the program more loosely coupled and to better adhere to the separation of concerns principle.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addTrip(java.lang.String userName, Trip trip)
      Adds a trip to a user with the given user name
      Http endpoint:
          PUT v1/trip
      Response:
          Status-Code: 200 OK
          {}
      History getHistory(java.lang.String userName)
      Get the trip history of the user with the given user name
      Http endpoint:
          GET v1/history
      Response:
          Status-Code: 200 OK
          {
              "offset": 0,
              "limit": 0,
              "count": 0,
              "history":
              [
                  {
                      "uuid": "7354db54-cc9b-4961-81f2-0094b8e2d215",
                      "request_time": 1401884467,
                      "product_id": "edf5e5eb-6ae6-44af-bec6-5bdcf1e3ed2c",

                      "start_time": 1401884646,

                  }
              ]
          }
      User getUser(java.lang.String userName)
      Get the user with the given user name
      Http endpoint:
          GET v1/user
      Response:
          Status-Code: 200 OK
          {
              "uuid": "7354db54-cc9b-4961-81f2-0094b8e2d215",
              "user_name": "Bobby123,
              "first_name": "Bob",
              "last_name": "the builder",
              "e_mail": "bob@builder.com",
              "password": "YesWeCan1",
              "picture": "bob.png",
              "promo_code": "bobby"
          }
      UserPage getUsers(int pageNumber)
      Get a paginated list of users at most 100 users
      Http endpoint:
          GET v1/user
      Response:
          Status-Code: 200 OK

              "users":

      • addTrip

        void addTrip(java.lang.String userName,
             Trip trip)
      throws UserNotFoundException
        Adds a trip to a user with the given user name
        Http endpoint:
            PUT v1/trip
        Response:
            Status-Code: 200 OK
            {}
        Parameters:
        userName - The user name of the user
        trip - The trip that should be added
        Throws:
        UserNotFoundException - Thrown if there is no user with the given user name

            throws UserNotFoundException
        Get the trip history of the user with the given user name
        Http endpoint:
            GET v1/history
        Response:
            Status-Code: 200 OK
            {
                "offset": 0,
                "limit": 0,
                "count": 0,
                "history":
                [

                ]
            }
        Parameters:
        userName - The user name of the user
        Returns:
        The history of the user's trips
        Throws:

      • signup

        void signup(java.lang.String userName,
            java.lang.String firstName,
            java.lang.String lastName,
            java.lang.String password,
            java.lang.String email,
            java.lang.String picture,
            java.lang.String promoCode)
     throws UsernameExistsException
        Create a new user if no user exists with the given user name
        Http endpoint:
            PUT v1/user
        Response:
            Status-Code: 200 OK
            {}
        Parameters:
        userName - The user name of the user
        firstName - The first name of the user
        lastName - The last name of the user
        password - The password of the user
        email - The email of the user
        picture - An url to the user's picture
        promoCode - A promo code for the user
        Throws:
        UsernameExistsException - Thrown if the given user name already exists.

      • getUsers

        UserPage getUsers(int pageNumber)
           throws ServiceException,
                  java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Get a paginated list of users at most 100 users
        Http endpoint:
            GET v1/user
        Response:
            Status-Code: 200 OK
            {
                "users":
                [
                    {
                        "uuid": "7354db54-cc9b-4961-81f2-0094b8e2d215",
                        "user_name": "Bobby123,
                        "first_name": "Bob",
                        "last_name": "the builder",
                        "e_mail": "bob@builder.com",
                        "password": "YesWeCan1",
                        "picture": "bob.png",
                        "promo_code": "bobby"
                    }
                ]
                "pageNumber": 0,
                "numberOfPages": 1
            }
        Parameters:
        pageNumber - The number of the page that should be retrieved
        Returns:
        A paginated list of 0-100 users
        Throws:
        ServiceException - If the page number if too high. I.e. if there are not enough users to fill pageNumber pages
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Thrown if the given page number if less than 0
